sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import CommonBanner from "../../../common/banner/CommonBanner"; import Footer from "../../../common/footer/Footer"; import Header from "../../../common/header/Header"; import InfoSection from "../../../common/infoSection/InfoSection"; class QA extends React.Component { render() { return ( <>
Quality Assurance

BrainHR offers a range of Quality Assurance, manual and automation testing services to clients worldwide. With expertise in Java and Javascript, the company leverages a wide range of tools and technologies such as Selenium WebDriver, Kafka, .Net Framework 2.0, C# and VB.NET, SQL Server, Jira, Gitflow, HP ALM, TestNG, NUnit, Mockito, PowerMock, EasyMock, WireMock, RestAssured, Eclipse IDE, Maven, Jenkins, Soap UI, Angular JS, Rest API, Cucumber, Load Runner, Protractor, QTP, Appium, TestComplete, Ranorex, Katalon Studio, Robot Framework, JMeter, LoadRunner, SoapUI, Postman, HTML, XML, XPath, Firebug, PL SQL, ETL, Windows, Bugzilla, and Jira to deliver high-quality and reliable software solutions.

The list of tools used by BrainHR for Automation and Manual Testing services include HP Quality Center, IBM Rational Quality Manager, TestRail, JIRA, Zephyr, TFS (Team Foundation Server), Visual Studio Test Professional, QTP/UFT (Quick Test Professional/Unified Functional Testing). Our team of experienced professionals is committed to delivering exceptional services that meet the unique needs of each client, ensuring that all projects are completed on time and within budget.

BrainHR offers manual testing, automation testing, and quality assurance services. Our team has experience in testing complete Java-based web applications, configuring Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, Ant tool, and creating automation scripts in Java using JUnit prior to agile release. We automate test cases using Selenium WebDriver with TestNG, perform Restful Web Service testing using Http Client Java library, and execute test cases for functional, regression, and end-to-end testing. We also log defects in QC, execute regression testing, and develop and execute SQL queries to verify the proper insertion, deletion, and updates into the Oracle supporting tables and cubes.

We perform functional testing to identify various critical points in the application and automated it by using Selenium WebDriver, and conduct backend testing using SQL queries to validate data for database editing and debugging tests using Cucumber. We have also worked with POM for the sake of code reusability, and have good experience on configuring the hubs and nodes while implementing parallel testing using Selenium grid.

BrainHR performs manual and automation testing of web services, client server, and web-based applications in different domains using cucumber serenity BDD, postman, and CURL commands. We have hands-on experience in Quality Assurance including functional, system, smoke, regression, and integration testing, user acceptance test (UAT), and compatibility testing of web and client-server based applications.

We have expertise in all phases of software testing life cycle (STLC), software development life cycle (SDLC), bug life cycle, and methods like waterfall and agile. We use various technical tools such as ParaSoft SOA test, Postman, and Splunk to test SOAP and REST services, perform data setup/testing, and analyze data. Our team also creates micro-rest services using Spring Boot and deploys them on Cloud Foundry Pivotal. We are familiar with source code management tools like Gitlab and Sitescope, and also use build tools like Ant, Maven, and Gradle.

JavaScript is another widely used programming language for software development. BrainHR's experts have in-depth knowledge of JavaScript tools and frameworks, including Node.js, React, and Angular. Our company's JavaScript development services include design, development, and testing of web applications. BrainHR's JavaScript testing services include functional testing, UI testing, and cross-browser testing. To ensure the quality and effectiveness of its testing services, BrainHR uses a range of advanced testing tools and frameworks. These include Selenium, Appium, JMeter, TestNG, and JUnit. These tools enable BrainHR's experts to develop and execute automated test scripts, perform performance testing, and ensure the reliability and scalability of software products.

BrainHR uses several tools to automate the testing process. Selenium WebDriver is a popular tool used for automating web browsers, while Appium is used for testing mobile applications. TestComplete and Ranorex are other popular tools used for testing desktop and mobile applications. Katalon Studio is a complete automation solution that can be used for web, API, and mobile testing. The Robot Framework is a generic test automation framework that supports various scripting languages, including Python and Java. JMeter and LoadRunner are performance testing tools, while SoapUI and Postman are used for API testing.

BrainHR uses JUnit, TestNG, and NUnit popular testing frameworks for Java and .NET applications. Mockito, PowerMock, and EasyMock are mocking frameworks that can be used to simulate behavior and test code in isolation. We use WireMock as a web service testing tool that allows developers to simulate responses from a web service. We use RestAssured as a Java-based library that can be used for testing RESTful APIs, while Cucumber and Serenity are popular testing frameworks for behavior-driven development (BDD) in Java.

In addition to automation testing, BrainHR also provides manual and automation testing services. HP Quality Center and IBM Rational Quality Manager are enterprise-level test management tools that can be used to manage manual and automated testing. TestRail is a web-based test management tool that can be used to track and manage test cases and results. JIRA and Zephyr are issue and project management tools that can be used to manage software testing projects. TFS (Team Foundation Server) and Visual Studio Test Professional are tools used for testing .NET applications. QTP/UFT and Rational Functional Tester are popular tools used for automated functional testing.

According to a report by MarketsandMarkets, the global software testing market size is expected to grow from $27.98 billion in 2018 to $50.14 billion by 2023, at a CAGR of 12.7% during the forecast period. With the growing need for reliable and efficient software, QA, Manual and Automation Testing services have become crucial for businesses to ensure their software performs as expected. BrainHR's expertise in providing quality testing services using industry-standard tools and frameworks can help businesses achieve high-quality software while reducing costs and time-to-market.

); } } export default QA;
